request.name: attach

description.summary: Transfer array buffer ownership to the compositor.

request.description:
Attaches an HTML5 array buffer to the compositor. After attaching, the array buffer ownership is passed to the compositor main thread. The array buffer can not be used for writing anymore by the client as per HTML5 Transferable objects spec.
The pixel format of the attached array buffer must always be RGBA8888 as per HTML5 ImageData spec. Stride must always equal width.

arg.name: contents
arg.summary: An HTML5 array buffer to attach to the compositor.

event.name: detach

description.summary: Transfer array buffer ownership to the client.

event.description: Detaches a previously attached HTML5 array buffer from the compositor and returns it to the client so it can be reused again for writing. After detaching, the array buffer ownership is passed from the compositor main thread back to the client.

arg.name: contents
arg.summary: An HTML5 array buffer, detached from the compositor

interface.name: gr_web_shm
interface.description:
A singleton global object that provides support for shared memory through HTML5 array buffers.
Clients can create wl_buffer objects using the create_buffer request.

request.name: create_buffer
request.description: Create a wl_buffer object from a web_array_buffer so it can be used with a surface.
